CustomField.description:
The Finish Variance field contains the amount of time that represents the difference between a baseline finish date of a task and its currently scheduled finish date.
Finish Variance = Finish Date - Baseline Finish
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Finish Variance = Finish Date - Baseline Finish
The Finish Variance field contains the amount of time that represents the difference between a baseline finish date of a task and its currently scheduled finish date.
CustomField.label: Finish Variance
